description:
Beautiful large modern 2 bedroom apartment in the heart of Williamsburg. Withing blocks of amazing restaurants, bars, shopping, concert venues, night life, and much much more. Perfectly in between the L and JMZ subway makes it easy to get to any part of Manhattan. 

The apartment has 2 large bedrooms with queen size mattresses. An additional blow-up queen mattress is included. The kitchen has all pots/pans, utensils, dishes, glasses for use.

This really is an amazing location for any traveler.
name: Modern 2 Bedroom in Heart of Williamsburg
review:
This place was great in so many ways than one. It's a few minutes walking distance from the L train, which made it really easy to get to the places that we wanted to go to. Bedford Avenue has so many restaurants and bars to choose from and has a pharmacy and Whole Foods a few blocks down in case we needed supplies/food. As a runner, I was pleased to find the on-ramp to the Williamsburg Bridge a couple of blocks down the same street! 

The actual place was very accommodating for me and my 3 guests. We all had a queen-sized bed to sleep in, an island countertop with spacious living room. We felt very secure in the apartment complex and it wasn't noisy at all, making it easy to sleep. Street parking was super easy to find. Sean made the key process very simple and he was quick to respond to any questions that we had. I would definitely recommend staying at his place when visiting this lively, hip area of Brooklyn.
